snippet: Investors may have been entering the market to take advantage of the recent declines.
abstract: Stock market sputters to an indecisive close following three straight days of losses; shift could reflect buyers entering market to capitalize on recent declines.
lead_paragraph: Investors may have been entering the market to take advantage of the recent declines.

headline.main: Market Nearly Static After Days of Losses
headline.print_headline: Market Nearly Static After Days of Losses
